item.description:
My cell number is (617) 312-8095

Please update your R.S.V.P. if your plans have changed. We have 5 maybes and several people on a waiting list so if you're still uncertain please consider giving your spot up to someone who is waiting.

This is my first time riding this route so we may have to stop occasionally to get our bearings. I will drive the route and familiarize myself with it before our ride. We will ride together at a 12.5-13.5 mph pace and I expect to stop for 3 or 4 breaks. If you tend to ride faster than that please be prepared to either go slower and stay with the group or strike out on your own.

One of our members, Tom, will be leading the slower paced version of a very scenic ride starting from Concord Center, heading west to out to Groton / Lost Lake, and then back. We did this loop a few weeks ago, and it was beautiful. The route is entirely on paved roads, many of them back roads with little traffic. Some small areas will have steady traffic, but I have designed the route to minimize this as much as possible.

Here is a link to the route

This will be slower paced ride (12.5-13.5 MPH) with rolling hills, and a few climbs. Expect the route to last approx 4 - 5.5 hours depending on how many pit-stops are taken.

We will meet at Monument Square in Concord, MA. Be there at 9:45am, where we can say hello as I hand out cue sheets and we will be on our way no later than 10:00am.

Each person should bring an extra tube that fits their bike, plenty of water, and it is a good idea to have some energy snacks to keep you going. And please domnt' forget sunscreen...

Thanks again to JRA Cycles for sponsoring our group and making rides like this free of charge. Be sure to head over to their shop to say thanks!
item.name: Lost Lake - 40 Miles (slower pace ride)
